name: 鄭鈺潔
objective:
先修課程：近代光學。   1. 基本分析工具介紹 (6) 2. 基本光學系統 --- 近軸光學 (6) 3. 光學系統元件介紹 (6) 4. 像差理論 (6) 5. 像質評估 (6) 6. 光學系統設計 (6) 7. 光學套裝軟體使用 (6) 8. 光電設計專題 (9)
1.The tools 2.The basic optical systems 3.Basic optical devices 4.Seidel aberrations  5.Image evaluation 6.The design of optical systems 7.The use of Zemax 8.Project on optical design
schedule:
1st week：Opening and Meeting (Teacher will be online but TA will be in class to assist students to enroll this course)
2nd week：Ray Propagation in an Inhomogeneous Medium
3rd week：Ray optics by ABCD matrix (MATLA&COMSOL) 
4th week：Aberrations
5th-6th week：Solar dish receiver (by Pitotech)
7th week：Wave Optics and Maxwell's Equations
8th week：Gaussian Beam Optics (MATLAB&COMSOL)
9th ~10th week: Midterm Exam (COMSOL)
11th~12th week：Laser system (by Pitotech)
13th~14th week：Final project preparation
15th -16th week：Final project presentation
